title: Colette
description: Though Colette’s novels have been thought sentimental and she herself has earned a certain notoriety as a decadent sensualist, Nicole Ward Jouve argues that we need to look closely at Colette’s work again, and with the hindsight of feminist theory, to rediscover that inimitable talent for the inscription of sensual and familial pleasure.ISBN-10: 0253301025ISBN-13: 978-0253301024
author: Nicole Ward Jouve
